title: When are you enabling Xayah?
body:
I remember when you could buy and play champs on the day the patch went live.

I AM NOT A PATIENT PERSON.

replies.body:
Considering that the announcement regarding the unique icons states that the icons can be earned starting at 1:05 tomorrow morning (and considering the icons require Xayah and Rakan be available), it's a safe bet they'll be released at that point (if not a little earlier).

Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/get-special-xayah-and-rakan-icons-when-they-launch

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EV2E4LAp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-19T08:09:51.845+0000)
>
> Considering that the announcement regarding the unique icons states that the icons can be earned starting at 1:05 tomorrow morning (and considering the icons require Xayah and Rakan be available), it's a safe bet they'll be released at that point (if not a little earlier).
> 
> Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/get-special-xayah-and-rakan-icons-when-they-launch

Only person I have ever upvoted. I will mass downvote you (I have 40 forum accounts) if she's not available at 1am.

Only kidding...

Anyway, you posted this:

https://i.gyazo.com/2afa43ee6902b85d7e457904ee1d7134.png

I'll add you on my new account.
Typically Riot releases champs when the patch rolls out to the rest of the servers, for some stupid reason, but waiting is fun too, I guess, I almost played blind pick today.
They're both live :P This wait was pretty unsubstantial.
